verses.name: Romans 9:27
verses.text: Esaias also crieth concerning Israel, Though the number of the children of Israel be as the sand of the sea, a remnant shall be saved:

verses.name: Romans 9:28
verses.text: For he will finish the work, and cut it short in righteousness: because a short work will the Lord make upon the earth.

verses.name: Romans 9:29
verses.text: And as Esaias said before, Except the Lord of Sabaoth had left us a seed, we had been as Sodoma, and been made like unto Gomorrha.

verses.name: Romans 9:30
verses.text: What shall we say then? That the Gentiles, which followed not after righteousness, have attained to righteousness, even the righteousness which is of faith.
